doc.title: Loft Show Upstairs
doc.plot: It's a small space with a huge thirst for good music, cozy friendships and cold drinks. Folkwit recording artist Audrey Ryan throws 10 loft parties each year in her Boston area artspace, showcasing folk and rock acts from around the world. These shows are not advertised, so those in attendance have one thing in common- they're part of a vast underground music scene, evolving every month. Come experience this secret urban creative community as we pull back the veil...Loft Show Upstairs.
